languages.text: Каждый случай получения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, в том числе периодического, (в результате {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}) дает Айшаре +1 уровень эффекта "смягчение" (до 10 уровней). Каждый уровень увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 3. В начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} Айшары все уровни эффекта снимаются.
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, including damage-over-time ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}), grants Aishara +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of Aishara's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Каждый случай получения урона, в том числе периодического, (в результате {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}) дает Айшаре +1 уровень эффекта "смягчение" (до 10 уровней). Каждый уровень увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 3. В начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} Айшары все уровни эффекта снимаются.

Каждый случай получения урона, в том числе периодического, (в результате {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}) дает Айшаре +1 уровень эффекта "смягчение" (до 10 уровней). Каждый уровень увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 3. В начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} Айшары все уровни эффекта снимаются.

languages.text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, including damage-over-time ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}), grants Aishara +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of Aishara's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.
languages.original_text: Каждый случай получения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, в том числе периодического, (в результате {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}) дает Айшаре +1 уровень эффекта "смягчение" (до 10 уровней). Каждый уровень увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 3. В начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} Айшары все уровни эффекта снимаются.

traits.locale_text: Each instance of damage, including damage-over-time (burning, bleeding, toxin), grants Aishara +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +3 deflection for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of Aishara's next turn all mitigation stacks are removed.

Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, including damage-over-time ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}), grants Aishara +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of Aishara's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, including damage-over-time ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}), grants Aishara +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of Aishara's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

languages.text: 每当艾莎拉受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，包括所有持续伤害在内（如{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}），都会使艾莎拉获得1层“缓解攻势”效果，每层“缓解攻势”可使{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高3点，最多10层。当艾莎拉下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，所有“缓解攻势”层数都将移除。
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, including damage-over-time ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}), grants Aishara +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of Aishara's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: 每当艾莎拉受到伤害时，包括所有持续伤害在内（如{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}），都会使艾莎拉获得1层“缓解攻势”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，每层“缓解攻势”可使{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高3点，最多10层。当艾莎拉下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，所有“缓解攻势”层数都将移除。

每当艾莎拉受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，包括所有持续伤害在内（如{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}），都会使艾莎拉获得1层“缓解攻势”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，每层“缓解攻势”可使{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高3点，最多10层。当艾莎拉下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，所有“缓解攻势”层数都将移除。

languages.text: 継続{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}（{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}）を含むダメージを受けるたび、アイシャラは軽減効果のスタックを+1獲得し、スタックごとに+3の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を得る（最大10スタック）。アイシャラの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に、全ての軽減スタックは取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, including damage-over-time ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}), grants Aishara +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of Aishara's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: 継続ダメージ（{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}）を含むダメージを受けるたび、アイシャラは軽減{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}のスタックを+1獲得し、スタックごとに+3の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を得る（最大10スタック）。アイシャラの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に、全ての軽減スタックは取り除かれる。

languages.text: Cada vez que Aishara reciba {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, incluyendo daño por tiempo (como por {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}), recibe +1 acumulación del efecto mitigación, que le otorga +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por cada una (máximo 10 acumulaciones). Al comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de Aishara, se eliminan todas las acumulaciones de mitigación.
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, including damage-over-time ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}), grants Aishara +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of Aishara's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que Aishara reciba daño, incluyendo daño por tiempo (como por {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}), recibe +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} mitigación, que le otorga +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por cada una (máximo 10 acumulaciones). Al comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de Aishara, se eliminan todas las acumulaciones de mitigación.

languages.text: Wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet, einschließlich Verlaufsschaden ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}), gewährt Aishara +1 Stapel "Schadensreduzierung" und +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} (bis zu 10-mal). Zu Beginn von Aisharas nächstem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} werden alle gestapelten Effekte entfernt.
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, including damage-over-time ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}), grants Aishara +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of Aishara's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn sie Schaden nimmt, einschließlich Verlaufsschaden ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}), gewährt Aishara +1 Mal den aufaddierbaren {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Schadensreduzierung und +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} (bis zu 10 Mal). Zu Beginn von Aisharas nächstem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} werden alle aufaddierten Effekte entfernt.

languages.text: Chaque instance de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, y compris les dégâts progressifs ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}), confère à Aishara +1 cumul de l'effet Atténuation, ce qui lui permet de bénéficier de +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} par cumul (jusqu'à 10 cumuls). Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant d'Aishara, tous les cumuls de l'effet Atténuation sont supprimés.
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, including damage-over-time ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}), grants Aishara +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of Aishara's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Chaque instance de dégâts, y compris les dégâts progressifs ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}), confère à Aishara +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Atténuation, ce qui lui permet de bénéficier de +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} par cumul (jusqu'à 10 cumuls). Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant d'Aishara, tous les cumuls de l'effet Atténuation sont supprimés.

languages.text: Zamanla hasar veren {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} dâhil olmak üzere her {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} silsilesi; Aishara'ya +1 hafifletme etkisi birikimi kazandırır ve Aishara, her birikim için (maksimum 10 birikim) +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri elde eder. Aishara'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında tüm hafifletme birikimleri ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, including damage-over-time ({g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}), grants Aishara +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of Aishara's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.
